#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int main(){
    long long int num1,num2;
    int val,carry=0,t=0;
    while(true)
    {
    scanf("%lld%lld",&num1,&num2);
    if(num1==0 && num2==0)
           break;
      while(num1!=0 || num2!=0)
      {

     val=num1%10 + num2%10 + carry;
    // arr[i]=val%10;
     val=val/10;
     if(val > 0)
     { //carry=val;
        t++;}

     num1=num1/10;
     num2=num2/10;
    // val=0;
     //i++;
     }
     if(t==0)
         printf("No carry operation.\n");
    else if(t==1)
         printf("1 carry operation.\n");
     else
        printf("%d carry operations.\n",t);
     t=0;
    }
return 0;
}
